item.title: I'm kind of confused? - Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I am kinda confused. Well, when making dialogue with sendOption, I did:

		case 1:
            sendOption4("I'm looking for whoever is in charge of this place,",  "I have come to kill everyone in this castle!", "I don't know. I'm lost. Where am I?", "What do you do here?");
            c.dialogueAction = 2;
            c.nextChat = 0;
        break;

However, how does the server know what option I did?

So, I made case 2, but Iâ€™m not sure what to put in it.
